hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.program.report.ProgramPlacementSummary( programPlacement.id, offenderName.lastName, offenderName.firstName, offenderName.middleName, offenderName.suffix, offender.offenderNumber, supervisoryOrganization.name, correctionalStatus.name, case when locationTerm is not null then true else false end, locationOrganization.name, program.name, programPlacement.dateRange.startDate, programPlacement.dateRange.endDate, cast(:effectiveDate as timestamp) ) from omis.program.domain.ProgramPlacement programPlacement inner join programPlacement.placementTerm placementTerm inner join placementTerm.supervisoryOrganizationTerm supervisoryOrganizationTerm inner join supervisoryOrganizationTerm.supervisoryOrganization supervisoryOrganization inner join placementTerm.correctionalStatusTerm correctionalStatusTerm inner join correctionalStatusTerm.correctionalStatus correctionalStatus inner join programPlacement.offender offender inner join offender.name offenderName inner join programPlacement.program program left outer join programPlacement.locationTerm locationTerm left outer join locationTerm.location location left outer join location.organization locationOrganization where offender = :offender order by offenderName.lastName, offender.offenderNumber, programPlacement.dateRange.startDate, program.name
